actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to exempt small independent oil producers from the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973.

summary.text: Exempts small independent oil producers from the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973. Defines "small independent oil producers" as any person who owns five thousand or fewer barrels per day of domestic oil production, and who refines not more than thirty thousand barrels per day of petroleum products.

titles.title: A bill to exempt small independent oil producers from the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973.
